sentence.text: Our WES data is largely matched with the earlier 'adenoma-carcinoma model' (cellular response to DNA damage stimulus, KRAS, Ras protein signal transduction and GNAS mutations), but there are newly identified transforming growth factor beta receptor signaling pathway, MTOR, ACVR1B, negative regulation of protein kinase activity, ATM, CNOT1, EP300, ARID2, RET and MAP2K4 mutations in this study.

entity.text: cellular response to DNA damage stimulus
transforming growth factor beta receptor signaling pathway
negative regulation of protein kinase activity

sentence.text: We identified 22 genes including APC, positive regulation of protein phosphorylation, TP53, GNAS, Ras protein signal transduction, SMAD4, nucleosome disassembly, and PIK3CA with non-silent mutations in the cancer Census Genes.
